potential_risks: Difficulty in identifying and engaging all relevant stakeholders
Risk of conflicting requirements or miscommunication
Time-consuming process that may impact project timeline
required_skills: Ability to facilitate effective workshops and interviews
Analytical and problem-solving skills to identify and document requirements
Familiarity with requirements gathering techniques and tools

potential_risks: Difficulty in understanding the requirements
Conflicting opinions among team members
Inadequate design documentation
Insufficient understanding of the approved design
Inadequate setup of the development environment
Difficulty in establishing coding standards for the team
required_skills: Understanding of software development life cycle
Experience with setting up development environments
Knowledge of coding standards and best practices

potential_risks: Insufficient project scope definition, leading to scope creep
Failure to identify and engage key stakeholders, resulting in lack of buy-in
Inadequate project charter, leading to unclear project goals and objectives
Difficulty in creating comprehensive test cases
Potential for integration issues due to component complexity
Time-consuming process of debugging and documenting bugs
required_skills: Programming skills (depending on the programming language used)
Understanding of software testing principles and methodologies
Ability to create clear and concise documentation

potential_risks: Integration of new features may introduce bugs or compatibility issues
Optimizing performance may require significant changes to existing codebase
Testing feedback may require significant rework of existing code
required_skills: Software development skills (e.g. programming languages, frameworks)
Understanding of system architecture and component integration

potential_risks: Testing a complex system with multiple integrations
Identifying and reproducing issues with new features
Potential downtime or performance degradation during testing
required_skills: Knowledge of integration testing, performance testing, and user acceptance testing
Understanding of the system architecture and functionality

potential_risks: Dependence on specific infrastructure or software
Potential downtime or data loss during deployment
Unforeseen issues with production environment setup
required_skills: Understanding of production environment setup and configuration
